schemas.name: description
schemas.description: Description of network

schemas.name: fabric
schemas.description: Whether or not this network is on a fabric

schemas.name: gateway
schemas.description: Gateway IP

schemas.name: internet_nat
schemas.description: Whether or not a NAT zone is provisioned at the Gateway IP address

schemas.name: name
schemas.description: Network name

schemas.name: provision_end_ip
schemas.description: Last assignable IP on the network

schemas.name: provision_start_ip
schemas.description: First IP on the network that can be assigned

schemas.name: public
schemas.description: Whether or not this is an RFC1918 network

schemas.name: resolvers
schemas.description: List of IP addresses for DNS resolvers

schemas.name: routes
schemas.description: Map of CIDR block to Gateway IP address

schemas.name: subnet
schemas.description: CIDR formatted string describing network address space

schemas.name: vlan_id
schemas.description: VLAN on which the network exists

schemas.name: description
schemas.description: Human-readable description of the rule

schemas.name: enabled
schemas.description: Indicates if the rule is enabled

schemas.name: global
schemas.description: Indicates whether or not the rule is global

schemas.name: rule
schemas.description: firewall rule text

schemas.name: firewall_enabled
schemas.description: Whether to enable the firewall for group instances

schemas.name: image
schemas.description: UUID of the image

schemas.name: metadata
schemas.description: Metadata for group instances

schemas.name: networks
schemas.description: Network IDs for group instances

schemas.name: package
schemas.description: Package name used for provisioning

schemas.name: tags
schemas.description: Tags for group instances

schemas.name: template_name
schemas.description: Friendly name for the instance template

schemas.name: userdata
schemas.description: Data copied to instance on boot

schemas.name: key
schemas.description: Content of public key from disk in OpenSSH format

schemas.name: name
schemas.description: Name of the key (generated from the key comment if not set)

schemas.name: administrator_pw
schemas.description: Administrator's initial password (Windows only)

schemas.name: affinity
schemas.description: Label based affinity rules for assisting instance placement

schemas.name: cloud_config
schemas.description: copied to machine on boot

schemas.name: cns
schemas.description: Container Name Service

schemas.name: disable
schemas.description: Disable CNS for this instance (after create)

schemas.name: services
schemas.description: Assign CNS service names to this instance

schemas.name: compute_node
schemas.description: UUID of the server on which the instance is located

schemas.name: created
schemas.description: When the machine was created

schemas.name: dataset
schemas.description: Dataset URN with which the machine was provisioned

schemas.name: deletion_protection_enabled
schemas.description: Whether to enable deletion protection for this machine

schemas.name: disk
schemas.description: Amount of disk allocated to the machine (in Gb)

schemas.name: domain_names
schemas.description: List of domain names from Triton CNS

schemas.name: firewall_enabled
schemas.description: Whether to enable the firewall for this machine

schemas.name: image
schemas.description: UUID of the image

schemas.name: ips
schemas.description: IP addresses assigned to the machine

schemas.name: locality
schemas.description: UUID based locality hints for assisting placement behavior
schemas.deprecated: `locality` was replaced by `affinity` in the underlying Triton API.

schemas.name: close_to
schemas.description: UUIDs of other instances to attempt to provision alongside

schemas.name: far_from
schemas.description: UUIDs of other instances to attempt not to provision alongside

schemas.name: memory
schemas.description: Amount of memory allocated to the machine (in Mb)

schemas.name: metadata
schemas.description: Machine metadata

schemas.name: name
schemas.description: Friendly name for machine

schemas.name: networks
schemas.description: Desired network IDs

schemas.name: nic
schemas.description: Network interface

schemas.name: gateway
schemas.description: IPv4 gateway

schemas.name: ip
schemas.description: NIC's IPv4 address

schemas.name: mac
schemas.description: NIC's MAC address

schemas.name: netmask
schemas.description: IPv4 netmask

schemas.name: network
schemas.description: ID of the network to which the NIC is attached

schemas.name: primary
schemas.description: Whether this is the machine's primary NIC

schemas.name: state
schemas.description: Provisioning state of the NIC

schemas.name: package
schemas.description: The package for use for provisioning

schemas.name: primaryip
schemas.description: Primary (public) IP address for the machine

schemas.name: root_authorized_keys
schemas.description: Authorized keys for the root user on this machine

schemas.name: tags
schemas.description: Machine tags

schemas.name: type
schemas.description: Machine type (smartmachine or virtualmachine)

schemas.name: updated
schemas.description: When the machine was updated

schemas.name: user_data
schemas.description: Data copied to machine on boot

schemas.name: user_script
schemas.description: User script to run on boot (every boot on SmartMachines)

schemas.name: capacity
schemas.description: Number of instances to launch and monitor

schemas.name: group_name
schemas.description: Friendly name for the service group

schemas.name: template
schemas.description: Identifier of an instance template

schemas.name: description
schemas.description: Description of the VLAN

schemas.name: name
schemas.description: Unique name to identify VLAN

schemas.name: vlan_id
schemas.description: Number between 0-4095 indicating VLAN ID
